titleStmt.title: Die Mercurii, 6 Septemb., 1643 it is this day ordered by the Commons House of Parliament that the Deputy-Lieutenants and committees of Parliament, in any county of this Kingdom, or any five or more of them shall have power to take the examinations of all witnesses against any ministers that are scandalous ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Signed: H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
